sub_title: Interim VP / Director / Head of Products, Portfolio, Services, Innovation & Transformation
summary:
CHARACTERISTICS
A seasoned business leader with over 15 years experience in innovation, managing creativity and transforming organizations.

A real people manager that gets the highest results from a team with a leadership approach of trust in and creating opportunities for team members.
Result oriented and organization sensitive.

OBJECTIVES
To improve products and services and make innovations simple and useful for the user.

I wish to create and implement improved products and services which use technology to grow business and provide true value to consumers. And do so in a company that is dynamic, exciting, constantly innovating and which shows ambition, preferably internationally oriented.

treasury_media.title: ☆netrebel - 1000 Mb/s voor 39,- Het snelste internet voor een normale prijs
treasury_media.description: Netrebel kent maar een snelheid: volle kracht vooruit. 1 gigabit per seconde, zonder jaarcontract en zonder andere poespas. Sluit je aan bij de internetrevolutie. Word netrebel!

profile_positions.title: Director Product Strategy a.i.

profile_positions.description:
KPN is the leading telecommunications and ICT service provider in The Netherlands, offering wireline and wireless telephony, internet and TV to consumers, and end-to-end telecommunications and ICT services to business customers.
Responsible for the Strategic Innovation Program (Including User Experience Centre & Big Data Lab), the mid- to long term strategic product and services development department.

Activities: Program director (managing 22 FTE); Customer insight collection; Innovation management (agile proces); Product design (UI and UX); Agile product prototyping (technical development); Innovation venturing; Product pre-testing with customers; Mid- to long term product roadmap; Big Data initiatives with focus on improving customer experience

Results; TV and home entertainment product (online and IPTV platform); Mobile and fixed telecom convergence product; Home cloud product ; Online personal information management product.  Products are designed to be integrated with each other to enhance the overall brand experience.
profile_positions.title: Program Director Strategic Innovation & Customer Experience Design

profile_positions.description:
Within the board of the KPN wireline consumer market division (three ISP brands with internet, telephony and TV with a ± 1.8 billion euro revenue) responsible for strategic planning and business development. 

Activities: Lead the strategic & commercial planning (annual & long term plan); Innovation management; Business transformation; Manage M&A projects; Direction of technical - commercial issues; Influence public stakeholders (public affairs); Brand development (Alignment between the three KPN brands)

Results: Lead business transformation of KPN as an internet provider to a TV provider with 2M users. Lead strategic program to update network to invest in fiber and upgrade network speed. Acquired 5 different ISP’s to be integrated into KPN.
profile_positions.title: Director Strategy and Business Development
